question: To chop basil
option1: Stack basil leaves and roll into a cigarette. Slice leaves crosswise in a rocking motion with a sharp chef's knife to make thin ribbons..
option2: Stack basil leaves and roll into a cigarette. Slice leaves lengthways in a rocking motion with a sharp chef's knife to make thin ribbons..
